item.title: one Makefile for everything
item.description: here! you found it! this is one single Makefile that fits all projects with this file structure: project / ├── include ├── build ├── lib ├── obj ├── src ├── test ├── main.c └── Makefile TARGET_EXEC ?= a.out BUILD_DIR ?= ./build SRC_DIRS ?= ./src SRCS := $(shell find $(SRC_DIRS) -name *.cpp -or -name *.c -or -name *.s) OBJS := $(SRCS:%=$(BUILD_DIR)/%.o) DEPS := $(OBJS:.o=.d) INC_DIRS := $(shell find $(SRC_DIRS) -type d) INC_FLAGS := $(addprefix -I,$(INC_DIRS)) CPPFLAGS ?
